pages.title: Mourning Cloak
pages.text: Nymphalis antiopa, known as the mourning cloak in North America and the Camberwell beauty in Britain, is a large butterfly native to Eurasia and North America.$(br2)The immature form of this species is sometimes known as the spiny elm caterpillar.

pages.title: Mourning Cloak
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
